question: The Woods dispatch of 1854 is related to which of the following?
option1: Setting up of some universities in India
option4: Establishment of Administration Services in India
answer: Setting up of some universities in India
explanation: Woodâ€™s Despatch of 1854 is called the Magnacarta of English Education in India. As per the act an education department was to be set in every province. At least one government school was to be opened in each and every district. Grant in Aid was also decided to provide in private schools. Providing the training in the mother tongue of the Indian natives was decided.
